original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 326.65/90 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 326.65/90 to the US dollar on Thursday, from 326.70/80 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.40/55 percent from 13.40/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 13.75/90 percent from 13.80/95 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 13.80/90 percent from 13.80/95 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.00/15 percent from 14.05/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.00/15 percent, from 14.05/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.15/35 percent, from 14.10/30 percent. (Colombo/Dec14/2023)
